Text.Page:
The fundamental materials when etching are {@RawItem:206818}, {@RawItem:206819}, and {@RawItem:206820}. You can gather {@RawItem:206818} from a Crimson Essence, {@RawItem:206819} from an Earth Essence, and {@RawItem:206820} from an Azure Essence. Go to Activities - Gather in the Achievement menu for details. First, collect the following materials, and then I'll teach you the basics of etching.

{@RawItem:206818} ×5
{@RawItem:206819} ×5
{@RawItem:206820} x5

Good job.
These are the most basic materials for etching. Now, let's get you a design to get started!
You won't get anywhere by sitting still. Get moving!
